scripts.sitemaps:minify: for file in ./build/*.xml; do awk '{gsub(/>\s+</,"><")}1' "$file" | tr -s ' ' | tr -d '\n' | sed 's/> *</></g' > "$file.tmp" && mv "$file.tmp" "$file"; done
scripts.sitemaps: bun run sitemaps:generate && bun run sitemaps:minify
scripts.build: bun run clean && bun run build:common --minify --sourcemap=external && bun run copy:public && bun run sitemaps && bun run compress
scripts.dev:browser: bun run clean && mkdir build && bun run copy:public && bun run sitemaps && bun run build:common --watch
